trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound"> </xref> hendelser.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object must be created for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen, kan gjengis, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objekt må opprettes for hver rad i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event is raised each time a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>denne hendelsen oppstår hver gang en rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel legge til egendefinert innhold til en rad når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte hver rad i kontrollen må være bundet til en post i datakilden før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen, kan gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event is raised when a data row (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object) is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>denne hendelsen oppstår når en datarad (representert av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet) er bundet til data i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel å endre verdiene i databundet til raden når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewRowEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to access the properties of the row that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: En GridViewRowEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gir deg tilgang til egenskaper for radtypen som hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til en bestemt celle i raden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi hvilken rad (overskriftsrad dataraden og så videre) opprettes ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewRowEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av GridViewRowEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the `row` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>-Objekt i den `row` parameteren. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer rad som opprettes eller databindingselementer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Henter raden som opprettes eller databindingselementer.

trans-unit.source: Use the Row property to access the properties of the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Bruk rad-egenskapen til egenskaper for rad som opprettes eller databindingselementer.

trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the Row property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til en bestemt celle i raden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objekt i egenskapen raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi hvilken rad (overskriftsrad dataraden og så videre) opprettes ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer rad som opprettes eller databindingselementer.
